It has survived not only five centuries, আপনি কি নানাবিধ ধর্মীয় প্রশ্নের সমাধান জানতে চাচ্ছেন? লাব্বাইক পরিবারের সাথে পথ চলতে চাইছেন একজন উৎসুক গ্রাহক হিসেবে?

জাঝাকাল্লাহু খায়রান। আপনি কি একজন মুহতারাম মুফতী? যে কোনো প্রশ্নের উত্তরে শরীয়াহ সম্মত সমাধান দিতে সক্ষম? ইসলামী বিধিমালা ও ফত্ওয়া সম্পর্কে সম্যক অবগত? দ্বীন ও জাতির খেদমতে আপনি নিয়োজিত হতে ইচ্ছুক?

তাহলে এখনি Continue বাটনে ক্লিক করে একাউন্ট করে নিন।

Your profile has been submitted & will be reviewed by Labbaiik team. You will be notified if any extra information is needed. Stay with Labbaiik If you feel that the wider Muslim Ummah could benefit from any of your questions, we encourage you to keep your question public for their benefit. Yes, you should make the question private only if the question involves your personal information and special secrets, which you are not interested in sharing with anyone else. The Labbaiik team believes in protecting everyone's privacy and dignity. If you feel that the larger Muslim Ummah could benefit from any of your questions, we encourage you to keep your question public for their benefit. Submit to answer Donate here to improve the app Thank you for asking an excellent question.
Your query has been handed over to our experienced mufti panel. Very soon we will try to give you a rich answer to your question based on the Qur'an and Hadith, insha'Allah.

 Hope to stay with Labbaiik. More Shortcuts Theme Location General settings Terms & Condition Privacy policy Feedback FAQ Light Dark Choose a theme We highly recommended you to use automatic mode Updating your exact location is very important to determine the time of prayer. Because, the prayer schedule will be displayed in this app according to your location.

The location will auto update in your mobile's GPS system. However, if it seems wrong, update your location.
